tool_description: Validates private keys in various formats (hex, WIF, raw) and ensures they conform to elliptic curve cryptography standards for different blockchain networks.

private_key.description: Private key in hex, WIF, or raw format

key_format.description: Format of the private key: hex, wif, raw

blockchain_type.description: Target blockchain: bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash

error_messages: Invalid private key format: Key format must be one of [hex, wif, raw].
Invalid private key length: Private key must be exactly 32 bytes (64 hex characters).
Private key out of range: Key must be between 1 and secp256k1 curve order.
Invalid WIF checksum: WIF format private key has invalid checksum.
Unsupported blockchain: Use one of [bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash].
usage: Provide private_key and key_format, optionally specify blockchain_type. The tool validates the key and returns format information.

is_valid.description: Whether the private key is valid

key_format.description: Detected or specified format of the key

compressed.description: Whether the key corresponds to compressed public key
